summary: "That's it sweety, you're doing such a good job." Stephen complemented the man that rested between his thighs bobbing his head....
body:
“That’s it sweety, you’re doing such a good job.” Stephen complemented the man that rested between his thighs bobbing his head. Tony let out a low whine which caused the collar around his neck to tighten at the pull. “Shh, hun don’t worry you’re almost done. Then I’ll take care of you, yeah?”

Tony groaned and went back to the task at hand. Soon enough Stephen tugged Tony up, using the long chain that connected to the red collar, and placed a filthy kiss to the man’s lips. 

Tony responded by pushing his hips up against his owners. “Please, please.” He mumbled against Strange’s breath.

“Why don’t you beg like a good little puppy.” Stephen spoke in a deep voice, his eyes flashing.

“Please master, I’m aching. I need it.” Tony spoke in a low, broken voice. Stephen smirked and reached over to press the red butt plug-that was rested in the smaller man’s hole-a little further in.

Tony gasped out and mouthed at Strange’s shoulder. “It’s alright, don’t worry your pretty head over anything. Let me take care of you.” Soft grunts and low moans filled the room as Stephen replaced the plug with his long thin fingers. 

Stephen quietly placed hard kisses over Tony’s clear pale skin, that has been left untouched for so many years. Tony came in a high pitched groan and leaned heavily onto Stephen’s torso. 

He hummed as Strange ran his fingers through his hair. “Want to finish your first job?” Strange questioned, gesturing towards his groin. Tony shot the man a grin and went back onto his knees to get set to work.

summary: One shot: Twisted
title: One shot: Twisted
body:
Requested by anonymous: May I get a Tony Stark x black!reader based on the song Twisted by Keith Sweat? I absolutely love your writing 💜

Pairing: Black plus sized reader x Tony Stark

Warning(s): crying

Word count:  1155

Oh yeah baby
You got to make your mind up
Yeah, Kut Klose, hear me out

You know you are my lover
You got me twisted over you
I know I got what you need
So what you want to do

Baby, baby I know
Baby I love you so
But you don’t feel like I do
Tell me what can I do

 

“I really had fun tonight” Steve smiled while scooter closer to you on the couch, you chuckled and batted your eyelashes as you loved the attention he was giving you. You smiled, “Me too, I’m surprised that Captain America can move his hips” you teased while remembering how he had danced his heart out on the dancefloor at the club.

Steve’s checks reddened at your comment as you had been the only one who had seen him let loose and he didn’t regret it at all. He huffed amused, “If Tony would have been there, he’d tease me for the rest of my life” he added and placed his hand on your thigh. At the mention of Tony’s name, your heart dropped to the pit of your stomach as you remembered what you were doing.

You couldn’t decide on what man to choose and decided to date both, the feeling of having two handsome superheroes wanting you, dedicating all their time and attention of you made your heart swell with pride as you felt so powerful.

But the thing was that Tony had something that made you feel extraordinary, that man was able to make you feel so many and intense emotions and you found yourself yearning for his presence every day. With Steve, you didn’t feel the same way, spending time with him while knowing that you probably wouldn’t end up with him was just to feed your ego, nothing more.

“[Y/N]?” the super soldier gently spoke and waved his hand in front of your face as you had completely tuned out, “Sorry” you cleared your throat and smiled, “What were you saying?” you asked, silently hoping that he hadn’t noticed that Tony’s name was the reason for your little time out.

Steve chuckled, “I was asking if you’d like to meet up again, tomorrow? I thought about bringing the chocolate fondue fountain and same fresh fruits?” his voice lowered to a husky whispered while slowly leaning in. The image of Steve feeding pieced of fruit covered in chocolate was a delicate thought but your mind replaced him with Tony.

“I-uh..” you stuttered and leaned back, not wanting to kiss Steve as it felt like you were betraying Tony. “I have a busy day ahead and would be too exhausted to enjoy the chocolate fountain” you lied and let out a silent sigh of relief when the super soldier nodded his head in agreement and leaned back, but kept his hand on your thigh. His touch slowly began to make you feel uncomfortable as your mind body and soul began to yearn for Tony again.

You cleared your throat again and decided to call it a night as you wanted to be alone with your thoughts, “It’s very late, you should go and I’ll give you a call, okay?” you suggested to which Steve nodded his head and looked down at his watch, seeing that it was indeed late. “Yeah, I have an early training session in a few hours, don’t want to be all cranky” he chuckled, you added a fake one before standing up and adjusting your short dress.

 

But I gotta be strong
You did me wrong
When I thought that we were really down
So you say you want me
Make up your mind
‘Cause I’m not gonna be here for long

Baby, baby in time
Baby I know you’ll find
That what you needed was here
And think about it my dear

“I’ll see you around then” Steve whispered and gently hugged you, you wrapped your arms around his broad shoulders but still felt uncomfortable doing so, ”Yeah” you awkwardly answered and gave him a fake smile before leading him to the door, wanting to get rid of him so bad.

Steve gave you one last smile before turning around and opening the door, only to see Tony standing there with a bouquet of roses and his hands. “T-Tony?” you whispered as your heart dropped to the pit of your stomach, you immediately felt nauseous as you had been caught.

“What’s going on?” Steve asked while Tony entered your apartment while quickly scanning your outfit before glaring at the super soldier. “Are you dating, [Y/N]?” Tony hissed angrily while glaring at you. Steve nodded his head and furrowed his eyebrows in confusion, “Yes, we’ve been dating for three weeks now”. His answer made Tony clench his jaw while slowly shaking his head as he knew what you had done both of them.

“Same here, Steve. We’ve obviously been played” he continued to which Steve looked at you, hoping to have you say that Tony was lying but your avoiding gaze showed the opposite. “Wow” was all Steve said to which you swallowed hard, “Who do you want to be with? I don’t have time to be played” the super soldier spoke with annoyance as he felt so disappointed and hurt as you really meant something to him.

You clenched your eyes shut, “Tony” you whispered and listened to Steve scoffing loudly before saying, “Lose my number” before storming out of your apartment and slamming the door shut behind him. You slowly opened your eyes and had tears brim them when Tony dropped the bouquet of roses and shook his head.

“I love you. I know that we had been dating for three weeks but I knew that you were the love of my life, [Y/N]. I was willing to do anything for you, I stopped lying and seeing other women for you only to have you do all of that to me” he hissed while looking away from you.

His words were like sharp daggers to your heart, “Tony!” you choked through the tears and reached out for him, only to have him take a step back and hum in disapproval. ”No, you wanted me to show you that I was serious and I did. You’re a hypocrite for doing the exact same thing” you sniffled loudly and shook your head, feeling like you were about to lose everything.

“I-I love you too! I-It was never serious with Steve! I just liked the feeling of being desired” you shamefully confessed while your heart pounded harshly in your chest. Tony shrugged at your words and looked at his feet, “I felt the same way for a long while until I met you. Now I know that this is my karma for sleeping around so much…Thank you for teaching me that lesson” were Tony’s last words as he felt his heart break into tiny pieces.

You let out a sob and watched the love of your life walk out of the door, you hadn’t enough strength to chase after him as you felt dizzy and nauseous at your own stupid actions. You sobbed and sobbed while crying out for Tony, hoping that maybe he’d hear you and come back running, but that didn’t happen.

 

Breaking up down
You got me twisted
Thinking about the way that things use to be
When It was you and me girl I was so free
See you had my life
Like Cupid and I was just down right foolish and stupid
But now I know the reason for the pain and the headaches
You left me all alone now I can’t even concentrate
I guess I’ll wait for the day until you come back
Because my heart is where your love is at
You got me twisted

“I love you. I know that we had been dating for three weeks but I knew that you were the love of my life, [Y/N]. I was willing to do anything for you, I stopped lying and seeing other women for you only to have you do all of that to me” he hissed while looking away from you.

His words were like sharp daggers to your heart, “Tony!” you choked through the tears and reached out for him, only to have him take a step back and hum in disapproval. ”No, you wanted me to show you that I was serious and I did. You’re a hypocrite for doing the exact same thing” you sniffled loudly and shook your head, feeling like you were about to lose everything.

“I-I love you too! I-It was never serious with Steve! I just liked the feeling of being desired” you shamefully confessed while your heart pounded harshly in your chest. Tony shrugged at your words and looked at his feet, “I felt the same way for a long while until I met you. Now I know that this is my karma for sleeping around so much…Thank you for teaching me that lesson” were Tony’s last words as he felt his heart break into tiny pieces.

You let out a sob and watched the love of your life walk out of the door, you hadn’t enough strength to chase after him as you felt dizzy and nauseous at your own stupid actions. You sobbed and sobbed while crying out for Tony, hoping that maybe he’d hear you and come back running, but that didn’t happen.

 

Breaking up down
You got me twisted
Thinking about the way that things use to be
When It was you and me girl I was so free
See you had my life
Like Cupid and I was just down right foolish and stupid
But now I know the reason for the pain and the headaches
You left me all alone now I can’t even concentrate
I guess I’ll wait for the day until you come back
Because my heart is where your love is at
You got me twisted

trail.content:
Requested by anonymous: May I get a Tony Stark x black!reader based on the song Twisted by Keith Sweat? I absolutely love your writing 💜

Pairing: Black plus sized reader x Tony Stark

Warning(s): crying

Word count:  1155

Oh yeah baby
You got to make your mind up
Yeah, Kut Klose, hear me out

You know you are my lover
You got me twisted over you
I know I got what you need
So what you want to do

Baby, baby I know
Baby I love you so
But you don’t feel like I do
Tell me what can I do

 

“I really had fun tonight” Steve smiled while scooter closer to you on the couch, you chuckled and batted your eyelashes as you loved the attention he was giving you. You smiled, “Me too, I’m surprised that Captain America can move his hips” you teased while remembering how he had danced his heart out on the dancefloor at the club.

Steve’s checks reddened at your comment as you had been the only one who had seen him let loose and he didn’t regret it at all. He huffed amused, “If Tony would have been there, he’d tease me for the rest of my life” he added and placed his hand on your thigh. At the mention of Tony’s name, your heart dropped to the pit of your stomach as you remembered what you were doing.

You couldn’t decide on what man to choose and decided to date both, the feeling of having two handsome superheroes wanting you, dedicating all their time and attention of you made your heart swell with pride as you felt so powerful.

But the thing was that Tony had something that made you feel extraordinary, that man was able to make you feel so many and intense emotions and you found yourself yearning for his presence every day. With Steve, you didn’t feel the same way, spending time with him while knowing that you probably wouldn’t end up with him was just to feed your ego, nothing more.

“[Y/N]?” the super soldier gently spoke and waved his hand in front of your face as you had completely tuned out, “Sorry” you cleared your throat and smiled, “What were you saying?” you asked, silently hoping that he hadn’t noticed that Tony’s name was the reason for your little time out.

Steve chuckled, “I was asking if you’d like to meet up again, tomorrow? I thought about bringing the chocolate fondue fountain and same fresh fruits?” his voice lowered to a husky whispered while slowly leaning in. The image of Steve feeding pieced of fruit covered in chocolate was a delicate thought but your mind replaced him with Tony.

“I-uh..” you stuttered and leaned back, not wanting to kiss Steve as it felt like you were betraying Tony. “I have a busy day ahead and would be too exhausted to enjoy the chocolate fountain” you lied and let out a silent sigh of relief when the super soldier nodded his head in agreement and leaned back, but kept his hand on your thigh. His touch slowly began to make you feel uncomfortable as your mind body and soul began to yearn for Tony again.

You cleared your throat again and decided to call it a night as you wanted to be alone with your thoughts, “It’s very late, you should go and I’ll give you a call, okay?” you suggested to which Steve nodded his head and looked down at his watch, seeing that it was indeed late. “Yeah, I have an early training session in a few hours, don’t want to be all cranky” he chuckled, you added a fake one before standing up and adjusting your short dress.

 

But I gotta be strong
You did me wrong
When I thought that we were really down
So you say you want me
Make up your mind
‘Cause I’m not gonna be here for long

Baby, baby in time
Baby I know you’ll find
That what you needed was here
And think about it my dear

“I’ll see you around then” Steve whispered and gently hugged you, you wrapped your arms around his broad shoulders but still felt uncomfortable doing so, ”Yeah” you awkwardly answered and gave him a fake smile before leading him to the door, wanting to get rid of him so bad.

Steve gave you one last smile before turning around and opening the door, only to see Tony standing there with a bouquet of roses and his hands. “T-Tony?” you whispered as your heart dropped to the pit of your stomach, you immediately felt nauseous as you had been caught.

“What’s going on?” Steve asked while Tony entered your apartment while quickly scanning your outfit before glaring at the super soldier. “Are you dating, [Y/N]?” Tony hissed angrily while glaring at you. Steve nodded his head and furrowed his eyebrows in confusion, “Yes, we’ve been dating for three weeks now”. His answer made Tony clench his jaw while slowly shaking his head as he knew what you had done both of them.

“Same here, Steve. We’ve obviously been played” he continued to which Steve looked at you, hoping to have you say that Tony was lying but your avoiding gaze showed the opposite. “Wow” was all Steve said to which you swallowed hard, “Who do you want to be with? I don’t have time to be played” the super soldier spoke with annoyance as he felt so disappointed and hurt as you really meant something to him.

You clenched your eyes shut, “Tony” you whispered and listened to Steve scoffing loudly before saying, “Lose my number” before storming out of your apartment and slamming the door shut behind him. You slowly opened your eyes and had tears brim them when Tony dropped the bouquet of roses and shook his head.

“I love you. I know that we had been dating for three weeks but I knew that you were the love of my life, [Y/N]. I was willing to do anything for you, I stopped lying and seeing other women for you only to have you do all of that to me” he hissed while looking away from you.

His words were like sharp daggers to your heart, “Tony!” you choked through the tears and reached out for him, only to have him take a step back and hum in disapproval. ”No, you wanted me to show you that I was serious and I did. You’re a hypocrite for doing the exact same thing” you sniffled loudly and shook your head, feeling like you were about to lose everything.

“I-I love you too! I-It was never serious with Steve! I just liked the feeling of being desired” you shamefully confessed while your heart pounded harshly in your chest. Tony shrugged at your words and looked at his feet, “I felt the same way for a long while until I met you. Now I know that this is my karma for sleeping around so much…Thank you for teaching me that lesson” were Tony’s last words as he felt his heart break into tiny pieces.

You let out a sob and watched the love of your life walk out of the door, you hadn’t enough strength to chase after him as you felt dizzy and nauseous at your own stupid actions. You sobbed and sobbed while crying out for Tony, hoping that maybe he’d hear you and come back running, but that didn’t happen.

 

Breaking up down
You got me twisted
Thinking about the way that things use to be
When It was you and me girl I was so free
See you had my life
Like Cupid and I was just down right foolish and stupid
But now I know the reason for the pain and the headaches
You left me all alone now I can’t even concentrate
I guess I’ll wait for the day until you come back
Because my heart is where your love is at
You got me twisted

summary: Whumptober Day 12: Electrocution
title: Whumptober Day 12: Electrocution
body:
Word Count: 1081

Warnings: Torture 

Update: So apparently tumblr killed links (Idk why, it honestly makes no sense) But if that’s the case I won’t be linking my masterlists anymore until it’s fixed. If any post has a link in it, it won’t appear in the search engine. Obviously others are saying it too but please if you see a fic/content you like the reblog it! It just became much harder for content creators to spread their work and this would help a lot! You can find my Masterlist on my profile and the Whumptober Masterlist under series!


A scream echoes through the room. It’s Peter, he’s screaming.

Tony watches through metal bars chained to a wall fear edged into his features. Peter wasn’t supposed to be here, he was supposed to be home.

This was all his fault, this was all his fault. His kid shouldn’t be here.

Peter lays on the ground body seizing in pain, arms, and feet bound in shackles. A shock collar sat around his neck glowing brightly as a man loomed over the boy. A few more seconds go by before the screaming stops.

Peter goes limp, his breathing sharp and fast. A mixture of gasps and sobs tremble through his body.

He was just a kid. He shouldn’t be here, he shouldn’t be here.

“Tony,” Peter whispers almost reaching out for him until the man stomps on his fingers.

The screaming starts again, and Tony feels like he’s about to puke.

“Tony!” This time Peter screams out and all the air leaves Tony’s lungs. “Tony, please!”

The screaming continues only growing louder by the minute. Tony pulls against his chains desperately trying to get to Peter. Tears threaten to spill the longing he looked at his kid crying in pain calling out for his mentor to save him.

The screaming stops, but Peter doesn’t cry. Instead, he goes quiet and still. His body slightly twitching from the electrical torture he endured.

“I have to give it to the boy,” The man said with a smirk on his face. “He lasted longer than I expected. I’m going to have fun with his one.”

“He’s just a kid!” Tony cried out. “He has nothing to do with the Avengers!

“Even if that’s true Hydra doesn’t give me a kid a torture every day now. No, they come once every few weeks. And I hate to wait about a few weeks for the next one.”

Tony’s body shuttered. “You’re sick.”

“I’ll see you an hour Stark. Wouldn’t want to kill the boy just yet.”

He didn’t bother to look at the man leaving the room. His eyes watched Peter’s body making sure that he was in fact, breathing. Tony wanted nothing more than to run over and comfort him. To brush is curls out of his face and tell him that they’ll get out of this hellhole.

But he couldn’t, Tony could only watch a few feet away staring at the boy who should be getting tortured. They only wanted Peter for leverage, for some sick twisted game that involved Tony’s suffering.

He stares at Peter’s sleeping body one more time before a fresh set of tears ran down his face.

This was all his fault.

____

When Peter wakes up, he wakes up to the sound of sniffling. His eyes flutter open body aching from what he just endured. He wiggles his hands trying to find some feeling in his limbs before sitting up.

He groans shifting his weight trying to adjust to his soreness. His muscles felt sluggish tired from the spasms he experienced earlier. Black dots filled his vision as Peter was quick to blink them away.

“Peter?” Tony asked.

“Hi,” He responded remembering his helpless cries. “M’sorry for earlier.”

Tony eyes narrowed. “You have nothing to be sorry for Pete. I’m the one who should be sorry.” Peter opened his mouth to disagree but his mentor was quick to stop him. “You wouldn’t be in this mess if it wasn’t for me.”

“The only people at fault here are those Hydra freaks.”

His mentor sighed leaning his head against the brick wall. “I’m going to get you out this. I promise.”

“I’m sure the team is looking for us,” He shrugged before rolling out his sore muscles.

“Sore?”

Peter nodded.

“Let me know if you start to have any pain in your chest. And not from shocks. The last I want is your heart to have issues from the stress you’re being put through.”

The door slams open as the same sick man from before comes strolling in. Peter’s spider-sense buzzes loudly as a small hum comes from his shock collar.

“How ya doin kid? A little sore?” The man grabs Peter’s face roughly bring his chin upwards. “You know it’s rude to not acknowledge someone when they’re talking to you.”

“Leave him alone!” Tony shouts.

The man laughs. “God you’re so pathetic chained to that wall.”

Anger boils within Peter as he glares at the man. He doesn’t think, he spits in the man’s face. “Fuck you.” He smiles only for a moment before his senses warn him of oncoming danger.

“You shouldn’t have done that.”

His vision blurs, body slamming to the ground as it spasms. Peter gasps trying to get air into lungs a screaming escaping his lips. His body twitches, unable to control itself from the electrical shocks.

“Stop hurting him!” Tony yelled!

The man doesn’t listen, inside he turns up the intensity smiling at the screams Peter makes.  He laughs enjoying every moment.

____

Tony watched in horror as Peter’s body twitched on the ground, him gasping for air through his mangled cries. He wanted to look away, but he had to make sure his kid was ok.

He bit his tongue, making sure he didn’t cry. Not in front of Peter, not when he’s the one in pain. Crying can wait until his kid wasn’t looking at him with his own tearful eyes.

Peter screams loudly, his body locked tight in pain that Tony almost didn’t hear the metal footsteps knocking down his door. His head snaps to the side a wave of relief washing over him.

Rhodey.

Natasha is the next person to kick down Peter’s door. She effortlessly kicks the man the in the knocking him to the ground. She turns off the shock collar unlocking it from Peter’s neck

“Get me,” Tony huffs panicked. “Out of these!”

“Nice to see you too Tones,” His friend jokes breaking the chains.

By the time he’s freed, Steve was breaking Peter’s restraints as Natasha muttered comforting words to the whimpering boy. Once he was free, the kid practically wrapped his whole body around  Natasha body still twitching from the shocks.

Before Tony could even ask, Rhodey was quick to knock down the bars keeping them separated. Running through the opening his friend created, he slid over to Peter taking him out of Natasha’s arms and into his.

Peter whimpers. “Tony.”

“I got you, kid, I got you,” Tony whispers kissing the top of his head.

Word Count: 1081

Warnings: Torture 

Update: So apparently tumblr killed links (Idk why, it honestly makes no sense) But if that’s the case I won’t be linking my masterlists anymore until it’s fixed. If any post has a link in it, it won’t appear in the search engine. Obviously others are saying it too but please if you see a fic/content you like the reblog it! It just became much harder for content creators to spread their work and this would help a lot! You can find my Masterlist on my profile and the Whumptober Masterlist under series!


A scream echoes through the room. It’s Peter, he’s screaming.

Tony watches through metal bars chained to a wall fear edged into his features. Peter wasn’t supposed to be here, he was supposed to be home.

This was all his fault, this was all his fault. His kid shouldn’t be here.

Peter lays on the ground body seizing in pain, arms, and feet bound in shackles. A shock collar sat around his neck glowing brightly as a man loomed over the boy. A few more seconds go by before the screaming stops.

Peter goes limp, his breathing sharp and fast. A mixture of gasps and sobs tremble through his body.

He was just a kid. He shouldn’t be here, he shouldn’t be here.

“Tony,” Peter whispers almost reaching out for him until the man stomps on his fingers.

The screaming starts again, and Tony feels like he’s about to puke.

“Tony!” This time Peter screams out and all the air leaves Tony’s lungs. “Tony, please!”

The screaming continues only growing louder by the minute. Tony pulls against his chains desperately trying to get to Peter. Tears threaten to spill the longing he looked at his kid crying in pain calling out for his mentor to save him.

The screaming stops, but Peter doesn’t cry. Instead, he goes quiet and still. His body slightly twitching from the electrical torture he endured.

“I have to give it to the boy,” The man said with a smirk on his face. “He lasted longer than I expected. I’m going to have fun with his one.”

“He’s just a kid!” Tony cried out. “He has nothing to do with the Avengers!

“Even if that’s true Hydra doesn’t give me a kid a torture every day now. No, they come once every few weeks. And I hate to wait about a few weeks for the next one.”

Tony’s body shuttered. “You’re sick.”

“I’ll see you an hour Stark. Wouldn’t want to kill the boy just yet.”

He didn’t bother to look at the man leaving the room. His eyes watched Peter’s body making sure that he was in fact, breathing. Tony wanted nothing more than to run over and comfort him. To brush is curls out of his face and tell him that they’ll get out of this hellhole.

But he couldn’t, Tony could only watch a few feet away staring at the boy who should be getting tortured. They only wanted Peter for leverage, for some sick twisted game that involved Tony’s suffering.

He stares at Peter’s sleeping body one more time before a fresh set of tears ran down his face.

This was all his fault.

____

When Peter wakes up, he wakes up to the sound of sniffling. His eyes flutter open body aching from what he just endured. He wiggles his hands trying to find some feeling in his limbs before sitting up.

He groans shifting his weight trying to adjust to his soreness. His muscles felt sluggish tired from the spasms he experienced earlier. Black dots filled his vision as Peter was quick to blink them away.

“Peter?” Tony asked.

“Hi,” He responded remembering his helpless cries. “M’sorry for earlier.”

Tony eyes narrowed. “You have nothing to be sorry for Pete. I’m the one who should be sorry.” Peter opened his mouth to disagree but his mentor was quick to stop him. “You wouldn’t be in this mess if it wasn’t for me.”

“The only people at fault here are those Hydra freaks.”

His mentor sighed leaning his head against the brick wall. “I’m going to get you out this. I promise.”

“I’m sure the team is looking for us,” He shrugged before rolling out his sore muscles.

“Sore?”

Peter nodded.

“Let me know if you start to have any pain in your chest. And not from shocks. The last I want is your heart to have issues from the stress you’re being put through.”

The door slams open as the same sick man from before comes strolling in. Peter’s spider-sense buzzes loudly as a small hum comes from his shock collar.

“How ya doin kid? A little sore?” The man grabs Peter’s face roughly bring his chin upwards. “You know it’s rude to not acknowledge someone when they’re talking to you.”

“Leave him alone!” Tony shouts.

The man laughs. “God you’re so pathetic chained to that wall.”

Anger boils within Peter as he glares at the man. He doesn’t think, he spits in the man’s face. “Fuck you.” He smiles only for a moment before his senses warn him of oncoming danger.

“You shouldn’t have done that.”

His vision blurs, body slamming to the ground as it spasms. Peter gasps trying to get air into lungs a screaming escaping his lips. His body twitches, unable to control itself from the electrical shocks.

“Stop hurting him!” Tony yelled!

The man doesn’t listen, inside he turns up the intensity smiling at the screams Peter makes.  He laughs enjoying every moment.

____

Tony watched in horror as Peter’s body twitched on the ground, him gasping for air through his mangled cries. He wanted to look away, but he had to make sure his kid was ok.

He bit his tongue, making sure he didn’t cry. Not in front of Peter, not when he’s the one in pain. Crying can wait until his kid wasn’t looking at him with his own tearful eyes.

Peter screams loudly, his body locked tight in pain that Tony almost didn’t hear the metal footsteps knocking down his door. His head snaps to the side a wave of relief washing over him.

Rhodey.

Natasha is the next person to kick down Peter’s door. She effortlessly kicks the man the in the knocking him to the ground. She turns off the shock collar unlocking it from Peter’s neck

“Get me,” Tony huffs panicked. “Out of these!”

“Nice to see you too Tones,” His friend jokes breaking the chains.

By the time he’s freed, Steve was breaking Peter’s restraints as Natasha muttered comforting words to the whimpering boy. Once he was free, the kid practically wrapped his whole body around  Natasha body still twitching from the shocks.

Before Tony could even ask, Rhodey was quick to knock down the bars keeping them separated. Running through the opening his friend created, he slid over to Peter taking him out of Natasha’s arms and into his.

Peter whimpers. “Tony.”

“I got you, kid, I got you,” Tony whispers kissing the top of his head.

summary: Till time tear us apart
title: Till time tear us apart
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2yfRzII

by Kiyonek

She sat nervously, and then did a bit of storytelling about how she wake up this morning in the body of a woman when in reality she is a man.
Rhody all the while just stared at her… then stared at her more.
The waiter delivered the coffee and winked.
Toni smiled and said thanks in a cordial way before turning back to him. She didn’t winked back or immediately touch the coffee.
She. Didn’t. Touch it.
“So let me see if I got it right… you are not Toni.”
“My name is Steve Rogers, yes.”

Tony, doing yoga because Stephen asked: I’m such a nice boyfriend!
Tony's mind: Are you though? Are you really?
Tony's mind: You only agreed to this only to see him stretching in those yoga pants, didn’t you?
Tony: Shut up.
